description:
When I first met Colby, he had categorized himself as "mostly top," but said he might bottom for the right guy.
Foster is a total top and was excited about the idea of plowing Colby's ass. When they met, the two of them hit off instantly. Foster loved Colby's boyish face and manly body and Colby was pitching a tent in his pants before I could even get the camera started.
title: Colby & Foster
